name: 劉俊麟
objective:
學習智慧型手機的程式設計，課程包含應用程式基礎、準備開發環境、認識開發環境、使用者介面、各種使用者元件、資料存取、檔案存取、通訊與網路、硬體資料的存取。
This course will learn how to program the mobile phones, the topics including: basics of applications programming, preparing development environment, working on development environment, user interface, components, access of data and file, communication and network, access of hardware.
schedule:
Part I: *** Kotlin Programming 
Week 1: Course Syllabus、 IntelliJ IDEA and Kotlin (1/5)
Week 2: Kotlin Programming (2/5) 
Week 3: Kotlin Programming (3/5)
Week 4: Kotlin Programming (4/5)
Week 5: Kotlin Programming (5/5)
Week 6: Midterm Written Exam. (Kotlin Syntax)

Part II:  ***Android APP  
Week 7: Android Studio 與專案架構 (Ch. 01), 介面設計與元件佈局 (Ch. 02)
Week 8: 物件控制與事件監聽 (Ch. 03)
Week 9: Activity (Ch. 04)
Week 10: Fragment (Ch. 05) 與 訊息提示元件 (Ch. 06)
Week 11: 清單元件 (或進階清單元件) (Ch. 07/08)
Week 12: 同步與非同步執行 (Ch. 09) 與動畫製作 (Ch. 10)
Week 13: 多媒體應用 (Ch.11)
Week 14: Service/BroadcastReceiver (Ch. 12/13)
Week 15: SQLite (Ch. 15)
Week 16/17: 通訊與網路 MQTT (其他參考資料)
Week 18: 期末個人 Android App 專題製作與報告
scorePolicy:
Attendance: 10% 
Assignments: 30%
Midterm Exam.: 30%
Individual Android APP project: 30%
materials:
教科書:  "Android Kotlin 實作開發 (精心設計 20 個 Lab 讓你快速上手)"， 第二版，黃士嘉、周映樵，博碩文化出版
參考書: "Kotlin in Action" by Dmitry Jemerov and Svetlana Isakova, Manning
